definition: style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Pouring out the heart is exactly the writing style of this writer.
sentences.chinese: 这种直抒胸臆的写法正是这位作家的风格。

sentences.english: The plain, direct writing, devoid of metaphor, suits the genre well.
sentences.chinese: 而平白直接的写法，缺乏隐喻同样适合这样的风格。

sentences.english: That passage would, in many respects, be very differently worded today.
sentences.chinese: 现在这一段在许多方面都应该有不同的写法了。
引述与引用写法也各异。

sentences.english: The form is unified and variants are reduced.
sentences.chinese: 字形上统一写法，减少异体字。

sentences.english: Notational convenience compared to the use of containers of pointers.
sentences.chinese: 比使用指针的容器更方便的写法。

sentences.english: Public Security Economic Investigation Information Net of Anshan …
sentences.chinese: 鞍山公安经侦信息网的英文写法？

sentences.english: A hundred longevity in 100 words actually be meticulously carved in stone, wishes for health and longevity.
sentences.chinese: 百个寿字以百种写法被精心雕于石上，祈愿健康长寿。

sentences.english: In common notation, the siding of needle blade is used as the standard in accordance with machine number.
sentences.chinese: 普通写法以针叶边宽为标准，对应机号。

sentences.english: and all my tutors hate it if you put American spellings.
sentences.chinese: 我的导师们很讨厌你用美式拼写法。

sentences.english: With slow precision, he read two versions of the same epic chapter. In the first, an army marches into battle over a desolate mountain pass.
sentences.chinese: 他缓慢而精确地朗读同一章的两种写法。

sentences.english: The method of writing can tell you the meaning behind every character.
sentences.chinese: 繁体字的写法可以告诉你每个字的意思。

sentences.english: We can also reverse the range of element by writing it this way.
sentences.chinese: 我可以使用下面的写法转置一系列的元素。

sentences.english: The spelling of English is often puzzling.
sentences.chinese: 英语的拼写法常常使人伤脑筋。

sentences.english: We were poor at spelling so we couldn't spell those spiders' names.
sentences.chinese: 我们的拼写法很差，所以我们拼不出蜘蛛的名称。

sentences.english: The phonetic or orthographic strings or segments which realize morphemes are termed 'morphs'.
sentences.chinese: 语素的语音或拼写法的体现叫形素。

definition: Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
component of a Chinese character (as the radical or the phonetic part)
